00096         public function __construct(&$db, &$config, $column, $value, $profile = array(), $new = false) {
00097                 // Check the parmeters.
00098                 if(!is_string($column) ||
00099                    !is_string($value) ||
00100                    !$db instanceof DB_Database ||
00101                    !config instanceof MAIN_Config) {
00102                         return new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::WARNING, get_class($this) .
00103                                '::__construct', 'Parameter is not the correct data type.', $this->log);
00104                 }
00105 
00106                 // Store local table, log, and options.
00107                 $this->db            =& $db;
00108                 $this->log           =& $db->getLog();
00109                 $this->config        =& $config;
00110                 $this->table         =& $this->getTable();
00111                 $this->protect       =  self::$enableprotect;
00112                 $this->clienthashing =  $config->getOption('clienthashing');
00113 
00114                 // Initiate the object.
00115                 if(!$new) {
00116                         // Object is old, get info from database.
00117                         $this->updateFromDatabase($column, $value);
00118                 } else {
00119                         // Object is new; put together info array and push to database.
00120                         $this->info = array();
00121                         $info[$column] = $value;
00122                         $info = array_merge($info, $profile);
00123                         $info = verifyProfile($info);
00124                         if($this->clienthashing) {
00125                                 $info['hash'  ] = self::hashPassword($info['password'], 1000);
00126                                 $info['hasnum'] = 1000;
00127                         } $this->updateToDatabase();
00128                 } $this->log->log(MAIN_Logger::NOTICE, get_class() . '::__construct',
00129                                   "Creating new object with info: " . strtr(var_export($info, true), "\n", ''));
00130         }

00220                 if(!$this->parent || get_parent_class($child) != 'DB_Object') {
00221                         return false;

00224                 // Put classname in lowercase and change to plural.

00227                         $this->profile[$classname][] = $child->getProfile();

00229                         $this->profile[$classname] = array(array('id'      => $child->getId(),
00230                                                                  'name'    => $child->getName(),
00231                                                                  'profile' => $child->getProfile(),
00232                                                                  'object'  => &$child));

00258         public function getPassKey() {

00260                         return 1;

00274         public function checkPassword($new, $original = false) {
00275                 if(!$this->protect || !self::$enableprotect) {
00276                         return true;
00277                 }
00278 
00279                 if($original || !$this->clienthashing) {
00280                         // Compare the password to the original hash
00281                         // check if: h(original) == h(given)
00282                         if($this->info['password'] == self::hashPassword($new, $salt)) {
00283                                 return true;
00284                         } else {
00285                                 $this->log->log(MAIN_Logger::NOTICE, get_class() . '::checkPassword',
00286                                                 "Invalid password attempt on object with the name {$this->info['name']}." );
00287                                 return false;
00288                 } else {
00289                         // Compare the password to the a hash chain
00290                         // check if: h^n(original) == h(h^(n-1)given) where n is the hash chain iteration
00291                         if(self::comparePasswords($this->info['passhash'][1], $new)) {
00292                                 $this->changePasshash($new);
00293                                 return true;
00294                         } else {
00295                                 $this->log->log(MAIN_Logger::NOTICE, get_class() . '::checkPassword',
00296                                                 "Invalid password attempt on object with the name {$this->info['name']}." );
00297                                 return false;
00298                         }
00299                 }
00300         }

00312         public function changePassword($new) {
00313                 if(!$this->protect || !self::$enableprotect) {
00314                         return true;
00315                 }
00316 
00317                 $password = self::hashPassword($new);
00318                 $hash     = self::hashPassword($new, 1000);
00319                 $row      = array( 'password' => $password,
00320                                    'hash'     => $hash,
00321                                    'hashnum'  => 1000 );
00322                 $where    = array( 'name'     => $this->info['name'] );
00323 
00324                 $this->info['password'] = $password;
00325                 $this->info['passhash'] = array(1000, $hash);
00326                 $this->log->log(MAIN_Logger::NOTICE, get_class() . '::changePassword',
00327                                 "Changing password on object with the name {$this->info['name']}." );
00328                 return $this->updateToDatabase();
00329         }

00339         protected function changePasshash($new) {
00340                 if(!$this->protect || !self::$enableprotect || !$this->clienthashing) {
00341                         return true;
00342                 }
00343 
00344                 $newnum = $this->info['passhash'][0] - 1;
00345                 $this->info['passhash'] = array($curnum, $new);
00346                 return $this->table->update(array('hash'    => $new,
00347                                                   'hashnum' => $curnum),
00348                                             array('name'    => $info['name']));

00369         public function isAllowed($classname, $action, $property) {
00370                 if(empty($this->auth)) {
00371                         $autharray = $this->config->getOption('auth');
00372                         $groups = explode(',', $this->info['auth']);
00373                         $permissions = array();
00374                         foreach($groups as $group) {
00375                                 if(array_key_exists($group, $autharray)) {
00376                                         $permissions = array_merge($permissions, $autharray[$group]);
00377                                 }
00378                         } $this->auth = $permissions;
00379                 }
00380 
00381                 $x111 = "$classname-$action-$property";
00382                 $x011 = "*-$action-$property";
00383                 $x101 = "$classname-*-$property";
00384                 $x110 = "$classname-$action-*";
00385                 $x001 = "*-*-$property";
00386                 $x010 = "*-$action-*";
00387                 $x100 = "$classname-*-*";
00388                 $x000 = "*-*-*";
00389 
00390                 return in_array($x111, $this->auth) ||
00391                        in_array($x011, $this->auth) ||
00392                        in_array($x101, $this->auth) ||
00393                        in_array($x110, $this->auth) ||
00394                        in_array($x001, $this->auth) ||
00395                        in_array($x010, $this->auth) ||
00396                        in_array($x100, $this->auth) ||
00397                        in_array($x000, $this->auth);
00398         }

00406         public function updateFromDatabase($column, $value) {
00407                 if(!$this->db instanceof DB_Database) {
00408                         return new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::WARNING, get_class() . '::updateFromDatabase',
00409                                               'Invalid database connection');
00410                 }
00411 
00412                 $table = $this->getTable();
00413                 $res   = $table->select('*', array($column => $value));
00414                 $this->info = $table->result($res);
00415         }

00422         public function updateToDatabase() {
00423                 if(!$this->db instanceof DB_Database) {
00424                         return new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::WARNING, get_class() . '::updateToDatabase',
00425                                               'Invalid database connection');
00426                 }
00427 
00428                 $table  = $this->getTable();
00429                 return $table->insert($this->info);
00430         }

00441         protected function verifyProfile($info) {
00442                 if(!is_array($info)) {
00443                         return array();
00444                 } $columns = $this->table->columns();
00445 
00446                 foreach($columns as &$column) {
00447                         $column = $column["Field"];
00448                 } foreach($info as $key => $field) {
00449                         if(!in_array($key, $columns)) {
00450                                 unset($info[$key]);
00451                         }
00452                 } return $info;
00453         }

00466         protected function getTable() {
00467                 if(!$this->db     instanceof DB_Database ||
00468                    !$this->config instanceof MAIN_Config   ) {
00469                         return new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::WARNING, get_class() . '::getTable',
00470                                               'Invalid parameters.');
00471                 } $table = false;
00472 
00473                 // First check if the table exists.
00474                 $table = $this->db->getTable(strtolower(get_class()));
00475                 if($table !== false) {
00476                         return $table;
00477                 }
00478 
00479                 // Table is not set up, prepare to make new table.
00480                 $this->log->log(MAIN_Logger::INFO, get_class() . '::getTable', 'Table does not exist, creating.');
00481                 $models = $this->config->getOption('models');
00482                 $columns = array_pop($models[get_class()]);
00483                 $tablename = strtolower(get_class());
00484                 $sql = "CREATE TABLE $tablename (\n";
00485                 foreach($columns as &$column) {
00486                         $column = explode(',', $column);
00487                         $name = array_pop($column);
00488                         $type = array_pop($column);
00489 
00490                         $sql .= $name . ' ' . $type;
00491                         foreach($column as &$option) {
00492                                 $option = strtolower($option);
00493                                 if($option == 'null') {
00494                                         $sql .= 'NULL ';
00495                                         continue;
00496                                 } else {
00497                                         $sql .= 'NOT NULL ';
00498                                 }
00499 
00500                                 if($option == 'auto_increment') {
00501                                         $sql .= 'AUTO_INCREMENT ';
00502                                         continue;
00503                                 } $option = explode('=', $option);
00504 
00505                                 if($option[0] == 'default') {
00506                                         $sql .= "DEFAULT '" . $option[1] . "' ";
00507                                 } elseif($option[0] == 'comment') {
00508                                         $sql .= "COMMENT '" . $option[1] . "' ";
00509                                 } elseif($option[0] == 'key') {
00510                                         $sql .= strtoupper($option[1]) . ' KEY';
00511                                 }
00512                         } $sql .= ",\n";
00513                 } $sql .= ');';
00514 
00515                 if($this->db->query($sql) && $this->db->connect() &&
00516                    $table = $this->db->getTable(strtolower(get_class()))) {
00517                         return $table;
00518                 } else {
00519                         return new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::ERROR, get_class() . '::getTable',
00520                                               'Error setting up table in database.');
00521                 }
00522         }

00532         public static function hashPassword($password, $iterations = 1) {
00533                 for($i = 0; $i < $iterations; $i++) {
00534                         $hash = hash('sha512', $password);
00535                 } return $hash;
00536         }
